mapper.select: SELECT RECRT_YEAR FROM RECRT_SCHDL GROUP BY RECRT_YEAR ORDER BY RECRT_YEAR DESC
SELECT DEPARTMENT FROM CRCLM_INFO GROUP BY DEPARTMENT

select.if: SELECT c.RECRT_YEAR, c.RECRT_SCHDL_CD, DEPARTMENT, APPL_NUM, SCHDL_NAME,c.CRCLM_CD,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPL_INFO ap WHERE CRCLM_CD = c.CRCLM_CD AND ap.RECRT_YEAR = #{RECRT_YEAR } AND ap.RECRT_SCHDL_CD = #{RECRT_SCHDL_CD }) AS APPL_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUD_INFO st JOIN APPL_INFO ap ON ap.appl_NO = st.appl_NO WHERE st.CRCLM_CD = c.CRCLM_CD AND ap.RECRT_YEAR = #{RECRT_YEAR } AND st.RECRT_SCHDL_CD = #{RECRT_SCHDL_CD }) AS STUD_COUNT FROM CRCLM_INFO c JOIN RECRT_SCHDL r ON r.RECRT_YEAR = c.RECRT_YEAR AND r.RECRT_SCHDL_CD = c.RECRT_SCHDL_CD WHERE c.RECRT_YEAR = #{RECRT_YEAR } AND c.RECRT_SCHDL_CD = #{RECRT_SCHDL_CD }

SELECT c.RECRT_YEAR, c.RECRT_SCHDL_CD, DEPARTMENT, APPL_NUM, SCHDL_NAME,c.CRCLM_CD,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPL_INFO WHERE CRCLM_CD = c.CRCLM_CD AND APPL_INFO.RECRT_YEAR = #{RECRT_YEAR } AND APPL_INFO.RECRT_SCHDL_CD = #{RECRT_SCHDL_CD }) AS APPL_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUD_INFO st JOIN APPL_INFO ap ON ap.appl_NO = st.appl_NO WHERE st.CRCLM_CD = c.CRCLM_CD AND ap.RECRT_YEAR = #{RECRT_YEAR } AND st.RECRT_SCHDL_CD = #{RECRT_SCHDL_CD }) AS STUD_COUNT FROM CRCLM_INFO c JOIN RECRT_SCHDL r ON r.RECRT_YEAR = c.RECRT_YEAR AND r.RECRT_SCHDL_CD = c.RECRT_SCHDL_CD WHERE c.RECRT_YEAR = #{RECRT_YEAR } AND DEPARTMENT = #{DEPARTMENT } AND c.RECRT_SCHDL_CD = #{RECRT_SCHDL_CD }

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CRCLM_INFO (RECRT_YEAR, CRCLM_CD, RECRT_SCHDL_CD, DEPARTMENT, APPL_NUM) VALUE (#{RECRT_YEAR }, #{CRCLM_CD }, #{RECRT_SCHDL_CD }, #{DEPARTMENT }, #{APPL_NUM })
